Package camzup.core

Class Mesh2

  • java.lang.Object
    • camzup.core.EntityData
      • camzup.core.Mesh
        • camzup.core.Mesh2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntityData, IUtils
    public class Mesh2
extends Mesh
    Organizes data needed to draw a two dimensional shape using vertices and faces.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Mesh2.Face2
      Packages 2D mesh vertices into an object.
      static class  Mesh2.PolyType
      The type of polygon produced by the static polygon function.
      static class  Mesh2.Vert2
      Packages 2D mesh coordinates, texture coordinates and normals into a single object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Vec2[] coords
      An array of coordinates in the mesh.

      Type of polygon to draw when it is not supplied to the polygon function.
      int[][][] faces
      The faces array does not include information about the faces themselves, but rather indices to other arrays which contain vertex data.
      int materialIndex
      The material associated with this mesh in a mesh entity.
      Vec2[] texCoords
      The texture (UV) coordinates that describe how an image is mapped onto the geometry of the mesh.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_POLY_TYPE

        public static final Mesh2.PolyType DEFAULT_POLY_TYPE
        Type of polygon to draw when it is not supplied to the polygon function.

      • coords

        public Vec2[] coords
        An array of coordinates in the mesh.

      • faces

        public int[][][] faces
        The faces array does not include information about the faces themselves, but rather indices to other arrays which contain vertex data. It is a three-dimensional array organized by
        1. the number of faces;
        2. the number of vetices per faces;
        3. the information per face;
        2D meshes contain two pieces of information per vertex: spatial coordinates and texture coordinates.

      • materialIndex

        public int materialIndex
        The material associated with this mesh in a mesh entity.

      • texCoords

        public Vec2[] texCoords
        The texture (UV) coordinates that describe how an image is mapped onto the geometry of the mesh. Typically in the range [0.0, 1.0].

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mesh2

        public Mesh2()
        The default constructor.

      • Mesh2

        public Mesh2​(int[][][] faces,
             Vec2[] coords,
             Vec2[] texCoords)
        Creates a mesh from arrays of faces, coordinates and texture coordinates. The mesh's arrays are set by reference, not by value.
        Parameters:
        faces - the faces array
        coords - the coordinates array
        texCoords - the texture coordinates array

      • Mesh2

        public Mesh2​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a named mesh.
        Parameters:
        name - the mesh name

      • Mesh2

        public Mesh2​(java.lang.String name,
             int[][][] faces,
             Vec2[] coords,
             Vec2[] texCoords)
        Creates a named mesh from arrays of faces, coordinates and texture coordinates. The mesh's arrays are set by reference, not by value.
        Parameters:
        name - the mesh name
        faces - the faces array
        coords - the coordinates array
        texCoords - the texture coordinates array
